delete.description: Deletes a specific task definition from a stage

parameters.name: taskDefinitionId
parameters.description: ID of the task definition that removed from the stage

parameters.name: stageId
parameters.description: ID of the stage that is manipulated

get.summary: Retrieves a list of search hints containing basic information and a disambiguation of search hits.
get.description: Retrieves a list of search hints containing basic information and a disambiguation of search hits.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: search text

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace the search hits have to be part of

parameters.name: entityType
parameters.description: The ID of the entity type for the search hits

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: The resource type for the search hits

parameters.name: invalidValues
parameters.description: Set to true if the search hits have to contain invalid values

parameters.name: invalidLinks
parameters.description: Set to true if the search hits have to contain invalid links

parameters.name: hasAttributes
parameters.description: A JSON Array containing attribute names the result has to include

parameters.name: hasAttributeValues
parameters.description: A JSON Object containing attributes and values the result has to comply to. Values of attributes always have be defined as arrays. For example 'hasAttributeValues={ 'Company': ['sebis']}' would return all objects whose attribute 'Company' has at least one value 'sebis'

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Determines the sort order. Possible values are 'relevance', 'lastModification', or 'alphabetically'.

parameters.name: orderByAttribute
parameters.description: Determines the sort order by the value of the specified attribute. If the orderBy parameter is already set, this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: descending
parameters.description: If this parameter is true, the search results are sorted in descending order.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: max search hints to return

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: page number

get.summary: Retrieves a list of search hints containing full information, e.g., attributes of entities, meta information, and highlighted search hits.
get.description: Retrieves a list of search hints containing full information, e.g., attributes of entities, meta information, and highlighted search hits.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: search text

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace the search hits have to be part of

parameters.name: entityType
parameters.description: The ID of the entity type for the search hits

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: The resource type for the search hits

parameters.name: invalidValues
parameters.description: Set to true if the search hits have to contain invalid values

parameters.name: invalidLinks
parameters.description: Set to true if the search hits have to contain invalid links

parameters.name: hasAttributes
parameters.description: A JSON Array containing attribute names the result has to include

parameters.name: hasAttributeValues
parameters.description: A JSON Object containing attributes and values the result has to comply to. Values of attributes always have be defined as arrays. For example 'hasAttributeValues={ 'Company': ['sebis']}' would return all objects whose attribute 'Company' has at least one value 'sebis'

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Determines the sort order. Possible values are 'relevance', 'lastModification', or 'alphabetically'.

parameters.name: orderByAttribute
parameters.description: Determines the sort order by the value of the specified attribute. If the orderBy parameter is already set, this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: descending
parameters.description: If this parameter is true, the search results are sorted in descending order.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: max search results to return

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: page number

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: A comma-seperated list of attribute names which should be included in the response (or * for all)

parameters.name: meta
parameters.description: A comma-seperated list of meta attribute names which should be included in the response (or * for all)

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: An indication if the rich-text content of entities should be included in the response

parameters.name: tasks
parameters.description: An indication if the tasks of entities should be included in the response

get.summary: Generates a signed JSON Web Token based on the credentials provided by Basic Authentication.
get.description: Generates a signed JSON Web Token based on the credentials provided by Basic Authentication.
